trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_000<tab>Welcome to Tuliyollal! You're the, ah...<var 1A 02 /var>adventurer<var 1A 01 /var> Wuk Lamat recruited to her entourage, yes? If there's anything you wish to know, I am at your service.

TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_010<tab>Is it not obvious at a glance? Then again, perhaps an Eorzean would be unfamiliar with Mamool Ja culture... I am of the Boonewa tribe, and like most of my kin, I specialize in matters of the arcane.

TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_011<tab>As soon as I came of age, I left my hometown of Mamook and journeyed all across Tural to hone my skills. It gave me some much-needed perspective on the world around me.
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_012<tab>I considered traveling to Eorzea next, but I took quite a liking to Tuliyollal, and so I plan to remain to make use of my magicks here.
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_020<tab>Tuliyollal is the beating heart of Tural that the Dawnservant would call home.
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_021<tab>It got its start about eighty years ago, when the newly crowned Dawnservant decided to build a town centered on the Yok Huy temple ruins.
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_022<tab>By implementing a medley of techniques from all different Turali cultures, the Tuliyollal style of architecture was born! Beautiful, isn't it?

TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_030<tab>By the way, have you heard that Gulool Ja Ja is stepping down as Dawnservant? I suppose he just wants to live out his final years in peace. In any case, I hope you're excited for the ascension ceremony─it ought to be quite the spectacle!

TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_040<tab>More importantly, did you attend the ascension ceremony? As a proud citizen of Tuliyollal, I couldn't be happier to have Koana and Wuk Lamat as our new Vows of Reason and Resolve!
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_050<tab>Now if only there was something we could do about those disgusting metal monsters. The audacity of them to trample all over our proud history!
TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_060<tab>It was that same unity across all cultures that brought us together to protect it. I've never been prouder to call Tuliyollal home!

TEXT_REGYOK6TULIYOLLAL_00864_HAKEELJA_000_070<tab>And when Wuk Lamat returned home victorious, the myriad communities of Tuliyollal were right here to welcome her. Whatever problems are still ahead of us, I know we'll be in good hands─hers <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> Koana's!
